mapper.insert: insert into cs_home_center (GUID, COMPANY_CODE, NAME, CONTACT, PHONE, ADDRESS, LOGO, LEGAL_PERSON, LEGAL_PHONE, LEGAL_ID_CARD, BUSINESS_LICENSE, STATUS, PICTURE, OPEN_TIME, CLOSE_TIME, GRADE, PROVINCE_CODE, PROVINCE_NAME, CITY_CODE, CITY_NAME, COUNTY_CODE, COUNTY_NAME, TOWN_CODE, TOWN_NAME, VILLAGE_CODE, VILLAGE_NAME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, CONTENT, NOTICE ) values (#{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalIdCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{closeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{townCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{townName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{villageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{villageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{notice,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
